scripts.test:all: npm run test && cargo test && npm run test:python
scripts.test:haskell: export LDFLAGS="-L/opt/homebrew/opt/libffi/lib" && export CPPFLAGS="-I/opt/homebrew/opt/libffi/include" && cd tests/test_haskell && cabal clean && cabal run
scripts.build:python: cargo build --release --features uniffi && uniffi-bindgen generate src/ffi.udl --language python --out-dir bindings/python
scripts.build:haskell: cargo build --release --features c-ffi && cbindgen --config cbindgen.toml --crate ffi --output bindings/headers/connector_service.h
